Plot: See and feel what it was like when dinosaurs ruled the Earth, in a story where an underdog dino triumphs to become a hero for the ages.
Title: Walking with Dinosaurs 3D
Writer: John Collee (screenplay), Gerry Swallow (dialogue written by), David Skelly (additional story)
Actors: Charlie Rowe, Karl Urban, Angourie Rice, John Leguizamo
